class.name: ImportDock
class.description: The Import dock shows import settings for one or more files through an [EditorInspector].

method.name: get_editor_inspector
method.description: Returns the [EditorInspector] where import settings are listed.

method.name: set_edited_paths
method.description: Sets the current edited paths and replace the old ones.

signal.name: edited_paths_changed
signal.description: Emitted when the edited paths changes.
